description: Allows disabling certain questionnaire options for the containing item based on evaluating expressions.

element.definition: Allows disabling certain questionnaire options for the containing item based on evaluating expressions.

element.comment: Options listed are expected to correspond to either answerOption values or Codings found in the answerValueset expansion.  Systems SHOULD treat non-matching answerOptions and MAY treat non-matching answerValueset Codings as an error.
element.definition: Indicates one or more options that should be disabled if the specified expression evaluates to true
The expression to evaluate.  If the evaluation results in true, then the specified options will be suppressed.
